availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry Banta (Douglas County, Illinois, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Douglas County, Illinois, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Susan Banta. Father of Maria Banta, Robert Banta, and Albert Banta. Farmer in Douglas County in 1860. Private in the 79th Illinois Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.).

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Illinois, Douglas County, p. 176.
_Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Illinois, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M539, Roll 0004.
